Text.Text: AI Shipyard
Produces Ships for diplomatic partners, which allow them to settle in your sectors.
base ship asset
base ship asset description

We cannot share forever!

Pranksters pranking the World of Anno!
Spies searching for kskudlik and Taubenangriff +++ Last seen 5 AM in front of their computers +++ We are curious about the hunt +++ More on page 3!
